name: Love Game's: Wai Wai Tennis Plus
overview: Love Game's: Wai Wai Tennis Plus is the third and last game in the tennis series for the Playstation One and is also a tennis arcade oriented game. The game have three play modes: - Tournament mode: Compete in a tournament. - Vs mode: Play against the computer or another human player (or players) in different courts. - Quick play: Just a quick tennis match.
